function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Relocalised centres and decentralized work environments may lead to increased population density in these areas, posing a risk of contagion and rapid disease spread.","Impact":"Potential for rapid spread of contagious diseases due to increased population density in relocalized centres.","Mitigation":"Implement strict public health measures, increase healthcare infrastructure, and enforce strict monitoring of disease outbreaks in relocalized centres.","Technologies":"Smart sensors, IoT platforms for disease monitoring, advanced healthcare infrastructure.","People":"Population in relocalized centres","Owner":"Local and national health authorities"},{"Description":"Reliance on IoT platforms and smart devices for data connectivity creates a potential security risk, as these systems are vulnerable to cyber attacks and data breaches.","Impact":"Risk of sensitive data exposure, disruption of critical services, and potential for malicious attacks on smart city infrastructure.","Mitigation":"Implement robust cybersecurity measures, regular security audits, and continuous monitoring of IoT devices and platforms.","Technologies":"Advanced cybersecurity systems, encryption technologies, secure communication protocols.","People":"Data administrators, cybersecurity experts","Owner":"Technology and security organizations"},{"Description":"Increased use of non-car movements and micro-mobility may lead to challenges in maintaining hygiene and sanitation in public transportation systems, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases through micro-mobility and public transportation.","Mitigation":"Enhance sanitation and hygiene protocols in public transportation, implement regular cleaning and disinfection practices, and promote public awareness of disease prevention measures.","Technologies":"Advanced sanitation technologies, automated cleaning systems, real-time monitoring of cleanliness in public transportation.","People":"Public transportation users, local authorities","Owner":"Transportation and sanitation authorities"}]}
